attributes.action: Make sure all Cervical Smear test results are recived within 6 weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently in certain areas the wait to recieve smaer test results can take more than 18 weeks which is disgusting.
This is nevewr a pleasant time for any women let alsone the women who have had past problems.
If I went to  a private clinic I could recieve the results within 72 hours by paying £111 this eems both unfair and unsafe.
I was always led to believe smear test were important with such increase in waiting times maybe this is no longer the case.
